sentences.en: "It is the sort of malady which we call monomania," said the doctor.
sentences.cn: “这种病我们叫做偏执狂。”医生说道。

sentences.en: Dogmatism is a malady in the academic research nowadays.
sentences.cn: 摘要“独断论”是当今学术研究的弊病.

sentences.en: Economy law as a branch of law is overcoming the innate malady of market economy.
sentences.cn: 经济法就是为了克服市场经济本身的痼疾而出现的法律部门.

sentences.en: For the strong malady the strong remedy.
He was stricken at twenty-one with a crippling malady.
I suffer a malady that no balm can cure!
sentences.cn: 可叹的是我的病痛却找不到香膏来治愈.

sentences.en: Love is a malady without a cure.
Malaria is a kind of serious malady.
sentences.cn: 疟疾是一种严重的疾病.

sentences.en: Now, many of their estuaries and coastal seas are suffering the same malady.
sentences.cn: 但是现在, 那里的许多河口和沿海地区却出现了同样的问题.

sentences.en: Once people's thinking becomes rigid, book worship , divorced from reality, becomes a grave malady.
sentences.cn: 思想一僵化, 不从实际出发的本本主义也就严重起来了.

sentences.en: Separation anxiety was a malady she was intimately acquainted with.
sentences.cn: 分居焦虑是她深切体验到的一种心病.

sentences.en: The boy is suffering from some strange malady.
sentences.cn: 这男孩患了某种奇怪的病.

sentences.en: They are managing to control the malady into a small range.
sentences.cn: 他们设法将疾病控制在小范围之内.

sentences.en: This malady tries me so much.

trans.tran_cn: （制度或机构的）弊病，弊端，疾病，病症，弊害
